result.title: Selection, conditioning and characterization of aviation based plastics
result.description: The report will contain a review about the aviation waste plastics situation in EU type of plastic current treatment valorisation routes etc It will include a classification of brominated plastics and their current application in the aeroplanes in order to facilitate their classification and further treatment Finally it will contain a first approach for the recycling of airplane plastics parts including the preconditioning of the materials and the final separation by materials
